data.name: Delares
data.detailed_description:
Don't forget!


Our community


About the Game

In this game you will take on the role of an ordinary merchant traveling from city to city; things, however, aren't that simple - or rather, the world in which you are located is not a simple one. There will be enemies, natural hazards and other difficulties that you have to overcome on your way.
Your story begins with a small package delivery and will end... with your choices.

Gameplay

Action-RPG-Roguelike with procedural generation and a little economy component. Take orders for delivery of various goods to cities and to individual points of the world, deal with enemies with hundreds of types of equipment and decide whose goods should be honestly delivered, and whose to keep or sell to a competitor.


Features

  • Procedurally generating world, with various biomes
  • Animal taming
  • A HUGE number (200+) of different equipment which will help you to build out your way

  • Procedurally generating quests – new orders would be unique for every try!
  • Character customization
  • Total replayability! It’s a Roguelike after all!
  • Variety of mobs: from the Earth creatures to the mythical ones

  • Several bosses so difficult, that only a few can defeat and summon them!
  • Achievements!
  • The promise of content-based updates in the future.

data.short_description: Action-RPG-Roguelike with procedural generation and a little economic component. Take orders for the supply of various goods to cities or individual points of the world and overcome the difficulties on your way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With 2048MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With 2048MB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
